metadata.title: CVE-2019-11135 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - high
metadata.description: TSX Asynchronous Abort condition on some CPUs utilizing speculativeexecution may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable informationdisclosure via a side channel with local access.

criterions.comment: intel-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
